The large cryogenic bots went in stasis lock. It was not so much that 
he was damaged, but that the pain was overwhelming.

In his dreams, however, he saw.

He had always been closer to his Maximal side. No one could have made 
him doubt that. Perhaps it was because the Maximals had always been 
there for him, or that the Predacons he had met were always 
criminals... One thing was certain, he was almost a true Maximal at 
spark.

Almost.

Now, what he was seeing was his spark, bright blue, darken, more and 
more, until it was a deep navy blue. He heard himself scream, but he 
was not sure if it was out of pain, fear, or anger. He simply 
screamed.
